ygData.subject: RE: New Lambent Armor stats
ygData.msgSnippet: How is this possible?  Most (if not all) of the pieces require items that haven t even been added to the game yet (most notably Lambent stones).  Are you on
ygData.messageBody:
How is this possible? Most (if not all) of the pieces require items that
haven't even been added to the game yet (most notably Lambent stones). Are
you on the test server?

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 30 Bard (Povar)

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Benjamin Jerrad Segal [mailto:birdman@...]

> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] New Lambent Armor stats
>
>
> From: Benjamin Jerrad Segal <birdman@...>
>

> >
> > Sorry, I forgot to post that. The color is a very
> attractive deep blue.
>

> last night the
> leader informed me they had acquired the components necessary for a
> breastplate. I've been dying to find a new set of armor that
> doesn't make
> me look like C-3PO with a hatchet, and it couldn't get much
> better than
> blue ('cept maybe green, but the rangers already cornered
> that market, I'm
> sure).
>
> Athren Notechaser, little blue-boy to be
